title: Come tour today! 2 WEEKS FREE
map_address: 2223 Benson Rd S near Benson Road
posting_body: ['Take a virtual tour now!', '<URL>', 'Welcome to Echo Mountain!', 'Echo Mountain has been updated!', 'Ask about our brand new, renovated homes featuring gourmet kitchens with new counters, new appliances, and beautiful espresso cabinetry.', 'Check out the rest of our spacious homes, and you will notice our impressive fireplaces, new wood blinds, and upgraded flooring throughout.', "You'll love our interior features such as cozy wood-burning fireplaces, full-sized washers and dryers, spacious closets, and designer details.", 'Enjoy our beautiful community entertainment room featuring a big screen TV and luxury kitchen, or hang out at the outdoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, and 24-hour fitness center.', 'Echo Mountain is easily accessible from I-405 and Highway 167, which places you just minutes from Boeing, Valley Medical Center, shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment.', 'Check out some of our virtual tours!', 'Call today to schedule a personalized virtual tour today!', 'Echo Mountain Model', '<URL>', 'Echo Mountain Clubhouse', '<URL>', 'Echo Mountain Fitness Center', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 117', 'OR Text', and SR-167 draws major retailers and restaurants for Great Shopping, Food and Services', '- Stunning Views of Downtown and Brilliant Pacific Northwest Sunsets', '- Gourmet Outdoor Kitchen with Gas
